thread.section_title: Specialized Products Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Specialized Products Company | www.specialized.net
thread.title: Ben Winningham
thread.title_full: Specialized Products Company reviewed by Ben Winningham

author: Ben Winningham
title: Ben Winningham
text: This experience was great! I was on a dead line and needed a certain Die to get my job completed. The service was great, the web site was extremely easy to use and the shipping was very fast. I have saved this web site to my favorites on my computer and will definitely be using the Specialized Products Company again!! Thank you!
